Articles.Content:
I was watching a Kikoskia " Let's Play Xcom UFO Defense" when I noticed a link to a video of a program that I had not heard of before - Kerbal Space Program . It only took a couple of minutes of watching the video of KSP to persuade me to buy the program which I consider to be excellent value for only $23.00 ( converted for me to Ã‚Â£15.45 ). I anticipate many hours from now on trying to make the Kerbal race into Space travelling experts. I am also astonished at the plethora of addons available so far , especially considering that the core program is in a progressive stage of development.Many thanks for a fun and informative program.

DavidR
